text: RhosllanerchrugogDavies, Jenkins and Baines (eds) The Welsh Academy Encyclopedia of Wales, 2008, p.752 (also spelled Rhosllannerchrugog, ), is a large village and community in Wrexham County Borough, Wales. It lies within the historic county of Denbighshire. It had a population of 25,362. ==References== Category:Villages in Wales
title: Rhosllanerchrugog
